name: Cohesion Hex
description:
This is a sokoban-like made for the 2021 GMTK Jam. The theme was "Joined Together" . So there's a hex in this dungeon that  binds blocks together.

There's 9 levels. I spent too much time thinking of the mechanics and making the sprites, couldn't really make as many levels as I wanted.

Source code: at github
